product_name: REI Cress Creek Soft-Shell Jacket - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The winter-worthy women's REI Cress Creek Soft-Shell Jacket provides wind protection plus warmth. Its sharp urban design wears well both in town and on the slopes. Highly water-resistant polyester shell has a Durable Water Resistant finish and blocks wind to 60 mph; tricot lining offers light insulation. 2-way front zipper eases sitting and provides venting options; shaped placket has snap closures. Hood adjusts for optimal peripheral vision; drawcord hem and cuff zippers with snap tabs keep cold out. Handwarmer pockets; snap-flap chest pockets with cord port exit on 1 side; inner stash pocket. The REI Cress Creek Soft-Shell Jacket has a classic, easy-wearing fit. Overstock.
short_description: The winter-worthy women's REI Cress Creek Soft-Shell Jacket provides wind protection plus warmth. Its sharp urban design wears well both in town and on the slopes.
